Docs.summary: Provides a type converter for a property representing a data member in a data source. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > You typically do not access a type converter directly. This implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> is intended for use by a data-bound control at design time, and is instantiated with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverterAttribute> on a property.

Docs.permission: for operating with unmanaged code. Associated enumeration:
for operating in a hosted environment. Demand value: ; Permission value: .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.Converters.DataMemberConverter.GetStandardValuesExclusive%2A> method is called by the designer host before calling <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.MobileControls.Converters.DataFieldConverter.GetStandardValues%2A>.
